about_the_game:
synopsis============================================

The story with them who came to the countryside on a summer day like a miracle

Choi Won-jin, an elite college student at K University, came to the rural village one day for unknown reasons.

He, whose status and name are false, lives a pleasant daily life, bickering with Lee Hyun-ji, a native of the village.

Then one day, Lee Yu-jin, called the Empress of the Empire, comes to Earth with an accident of fire..

Real rural beautiful girl love simulation - the story of one summer day begins!

Producer Information============================================

Produced by Eugene Games

Illustration: Angel

Original Illustration: AROMDAMI

game play============================================

The game is a linear visual Nobel, and you can check a total of five endings depending on the user's choice.

Options appear at the following moments.

1. summer chapter 5

2. three chapters of Isekai

3. Daily Chapter 2

4. life chapter 1

5. chapter 1 of her

It is a choice between Lee Yoo-jin, the main hero, and Lee Hyun-ji in the play, and if you choose it, you will have a special story unique to the hero.

The user's choice determines the story of the final chapter.

If you choose 3 or more options to cheer for Lee Yoojin, you'll have to do a good ending

If you choose more than four options to support the local area, you can see the good ending of the local area.

If you choose the hero if you do not meet the requirements, it will lead to a bad ending.

There is a true ending that cannot be revealed as a spoiler.

If you select this local in daily2 and choose more than three options to support each local and Lee Yoojin, the option to the true ending in chapter her3 is lifted.

Attack each hero, and witness different endings!

difference from the original============================================

→ Illustration, Background, UI, Logo Renewal

→ Full text editing increases readability

→ While maintaining the character and story of the original, a large-scale remaster was conducted in the visual area.

→ QHD image quality support

Manipulation============================================

Select: left mouse click

Line Progress: left-click, scroll down the mouse, enter key

Skip: Ctrl, Tab

※ When selecting "Settings > Skip > Unreads", you can skip things you haven't read. ※

Resolution============================================

The game is fixed at a 16:9 ratio resolution for optimal play.

Please refer to this when adjusting the resolution.
